about_the_game:
As a smooth-talking snake-oil salesman, you're on a mission to swindle the sickly locals of various towns with your bogus remedies. Hone your haggling skills and make your medicine irresistible to those in need with the help of rare ingredients collected from the wild.

Play as the Outcast



With each successful sale, you'll upgrade your sales stall and expand your territory to reach new towns. But be careful not to let your reputation go south, one too many unhappy customers and you'll run out of business faster than a three-legged racehorse!

short_description: In this potion-crafting RPG adventure, step into the shoes of a naive snake oil salesman in a quirky Wild West world. Physically interact with tools and ingredients to craft phony remedies while honing your sales tactics to attract higher-paying customers and maintain your reputation.
